Mesquite::DimConst

Mesquite::DimConst< D > Struct Template Reference

Dimension-specific constants. More...

Detailed Description

template<unsigned D>
struct Mesquite::DimConst< D >

Dimension-specific constants.

Provide constants that depend on a template dimension parameter. For use in implementing targe metrics for which the target metric implementation is templatized on the dimension of of the matrix.

In optimized code these should reduce to literal constants.
